layout.heading: Our Development Process
layout.description: A proven methodology that ensures successful project delivery

steps.title: Discovery & Planning
steps.description: We start by understanding your business goals, target audience, and project requirements.

steps.title: Design & Prototyping
steps.description: Our designers create wireframes and high-fidelity mockups for your approval.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: Our developers build your application using agile methodology with regular updates.

steps.title: Testing & QA
steps.description: Comprehensive testing ensures your application works flawlessly across all devices.

steps.title: Launch & Deployment
steps.description: We deploy your application to production and monitor its performance closely.

steps.title: Support & Maintenance
steps.description: Ongoing support, updates, and optimization to keep your application running smoothly.

layout.heading: Transparent Pricing

tiers.name: Starter

layout.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
layout.description: Find answers to common questions about our services

faqs.question: How long does a typical project take?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity, but most projects take 8-16 weeks from start to finish. We'll provide a detailed timeline during the planning phase.

faqs.question: Do you offer ongoing maintenance and support?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer comprehensive maintenance and support packages to keep your application running smoothly. This includes security updates, bug fixes, and feature enhancements.

faqs.question: What technologies do you work with?
faqs.answer: We specialize in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and various cloud platforms. We choose the best technology stack for each project.

faqs.question: Can you work with our existing codebase?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We have extensive experience working with existing codebases, whether it's adding new features, refactoring, or migrating to new technologies.

faqs.question: What is your pricing model?
faqs.answer: We offer both fixed-price projects and hourly rates depending on your needs. We'll provide a detailed quote after understanding your requirements.

faqs.question: Do you sign NDAs?
faqs.answer: Yes, we're happy to sign NDAs and other confidentiality agreements to protect your intellectual property and business information.

layout.heading: Ready to Get Started?
layout.description: Let's discuss your project and how we can help you achieve your goals.
